titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: The violent tempest, which has raged for the last two days, has swept away four of the nine rooks' nests in the front garden. I attended Mattins, & then read the minutely erudite pages of
". In the afternoon I attended the meeting of the Sherburn Trustees.
is confined to the house with a portentously clamourous cold: but she played to us after dinner very charmingly.
